PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-12622002-07-170,  ,  ,  FIN, 
PrecisEnactment of REGULATIONS AMENDING AND REPEALING CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER PART IX OF THE EXCISE TAX ACT (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) which make minor amendments or repeal the following: . - Transitional Instalment Base Percentage (GST) Regulations - Health Care Services (GST) Regulations; - Equivalent Courses (GST) Regulations; - School Cafeteria Food and Beverages (GST) Regulations; - Value of Imported Goods (GST-HST) Regulations; - Non-Taxable Imported Goods (GST) Regulations; - Disclosure of Goods and Services Tax Regulations; - Communication of Information (Part IX of the Excise Tax Act) Regulations; and. - Offset of Taxes by a Refund or Rebate (GST) Regulations. .
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2002-0277 Publication Date: 2002-07-31
Attachments
